issue.title: [C++][Python] Deprecate and rename add_metadata methods
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2769](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2769). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Deprecate and replace `pyarrow.Field.add_metadata` (and other likely named methods) with replace_metadata, set_metadata or with_metadata. Knowing Spark's immutable API, I would have chosen with_metadata but I guess this is probably not what the average Python user would expect as naming.
